item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Apple acquires Pixelmator (704 points | 391 comments)

22. Implementing a Tiny CPU Rasterizer (24 points | 7 comments)
23. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (57 points | 26 comments)
